Weapons.Name: Bastard Sword
Weapons.Description: A middle-length sword that fits all types of warrior.

Weapons.Name: Giant Sword
Weapons.Description: A thick, heavy steel sword with extremely slow speed.

Weapons.Name: Golden Sword
Weapons.Description: A sword with high valuable in terms of material rather than power.

Weapons.Name: Iron Sword
Weapons.Description: A simple sword made of iron.

Weapons.Name: Killer Blade
Weapons.Description: A thick blade with sharp edges can even crush the enemy's bone.

Weapons.Name: Light Sword
Weapons.Description: A slim sword with fast attack speed due to its weight.

Weapons.Name: Noble Sword
Weapons.Description: A sword often seen in challenges between nobles.

Weapons.Name: Scimitar
Weapons.Description: A curved sword that was widespread throughout the Middle East.

Weapons.Name: Silver Sword
Weapons.Description: A sword that is rumoured to possess powerful magic against demon.

Shields.Name: Cross Shield
Shields.Description: A very popular shield among crusaders.

Shields.Name: Evil Shield
Shields.Description: A shield with ferocious symbols to scrare enemies.

Shields.Name: Iron Shield
Shields.Description: A normal shield made from iron that could be found anywhere.

Shields.Name: Lion Shield
Shields.Description: A shield that is believed to bring courage and luck to bearers.

Shields.Name: Noble Shield
Shields.Description: A light and balanced shield, often used by royal members.

Shields.Name: Paladin Shield
Shields.Description: A favorite shield of heavy cavalries, can stand against almost every types of weapon.

Shields.Name: Round Shield
Shields.Description: A normal wooden shield with low durability but is easy to move.

Shields.Name: Square Shield
Shields.Description: Has the same materials as the round shield but larger size.

Shields.Name: Teutonic Shield
Shields.Description: A famous shield of Teutonic Knight Order due to its high toughness.

Amulets.Name: Amethyst Amulet
Amulets.Description: Holding a subtle charm, this amulet is loved by every noble lady.

Amulets.Name: Blue Gem Amulet
Amulets.Description: A sophisticated necklace decorated with blue gem from the Nalian Sea.

Amulets.Name: Fire Lord Anger Amulet
Amulets.Description: Born in the ashes of the acient kingdom Sarleon after Ragnaros, the Fire Lord's wrath, this amulet can melt everything it touchs.

Amulets.Name: Nature Power Amulet
Amulets.Description: This amulet is worshipped by the druids and believed to contain power that can destroy any enemy dares to enter their lands.

Amulets.Name: The Three Pillars Amulet
Amulets.Description: Created by the Queen of Life from three most vital elements, Earth, Air and Water, this amulet is the ultimate goal of immortality seekers.

Rings.Name: Emerald Ring
Rings.Description: A rare, thoroughly carved ring with high selling value.

Rings.Name: Sapphire Ring
Rings.Description: An exquisite ring that is believed to bring luck and peace.

Rings.Name: Great Sea Of Phasis Ring
Rings.Description: In the Great War to divide the world, Theresa, Mother Of Gods used this amulet's power to flood the Hallan continent, which then became the Great Sea of Phasis.

Rings.Name: Mysterious Diamond Ring
Rings.Description: After the death of its last owner, king Stephen II, this amulet was rumoured to possess evil spirits and sealed in the Wizard Tower of Arcane.

Rings.Name: Whisper Of Death Ring
Rings.Description: One of the four Great Artifact of Anubik, an ancient necromancer, possessing his ultimate power that can bring death to enemies.

Quests.Name: Blue Gem
Quests.Description: This should do something useful when being at the right place.

Quests.Name: Red Gem
Quests.Description: This should do something useful when being at the right place.
